Software Description: [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) is a rootkit used by [Turla](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0010). (Citation: Kaspersky Turla)
Mitigation Description: Use signatures or heuristics to detect malicious software.
Application: Employ heuristic-based malware detection. Ensure updated virus definitions and create custom signatures for observed malware.
